definition: variant of 嘉賓|嘉宾[jia1 bin1]

sentences.english: This is a really wonderful party with interesting people and great food.
sentences.chinese: 這場晚會有美食佳賓真是棒極了。

sentences.english: Weekly Standard editor Fred Barnes is a frequent guest on VOA's Issues in the News program.
sentences.chinese: 旗幟週刊編輯巴尼斯經常是美國之音新聞節目的佳賓。

sentences.english: He set the chair apart form the others for the special guest.
sentences.chinese: 他把留給特邀佳賓的椅子與其它椅子分開擺放。

definition: both the guests and the hosts thoroughly enjoy themselves (idiom)
to deliver (a diploma, licence etc)/to qualify
Mingjian or Mingchien township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories

definition: Yangdong county in Yangjiang 陽江|阳江[Yang2 jiang1], Guangdong
